ComicInfo.Title: Our Toxic Friends
ComicInfo.Summary:
The Joes travel to Eastern Europe to sabotage a key component of Cobra’s industrial war machine. To do so, moral lines will have to be crossed, and complicated relationships will have to be destroyed. G.I. Joe’s multi-pronged assault on Cobra is just beginning.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Niko Walter | 1-2 | B | Cover B | Freddie E. Williams II (a) & Jeremy Colwell (c) | 3 | RI | 1:10 Retailer Incentive Variant Cover | Adam Gorham (a) & Kelly Fitzpatrick (c) | 4 | Note: The digital edition (9/9/2020) for this issue was released before the print edition.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-23 20:15:45. [CVDB797466]
ComicInfo.Colorist: Brittany Peer, Jeremy Colwell, Kelly Fitzpatrick
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Adam Gorham, Freddie E. Williams II, Jeremy Colwell, Kelly Fitzpatrick, Niko Walter
ComicInfo.Characters: BATS, Bombstrike, Chuckles, COBRA Viper, Dr. Venom
